Key Match Events: The match between Australia and England was abandoned due to incessant rains at the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG).
Both England and Australia were awarded one point each due to the match abandonment.
Adam Zampa returned to the squad after testing positive for Covid-19 before Australia's match against Sri Lanka.
Glenn Maxwell praised Marcus Stoinis for his performance in a previous match, highlighting his fastest fifty record for Australia.
Pre-Game Insights: Glenn Maxwell mentioned the team's confidence and readiness, emphasizing their ability to win from any position.
Australia entered the tournament without a backup wicketkeeper, with Matthew Wade down with Covid-19 and potential replacements being Aaron Finch, David Warner, and Glenn Maxwell.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Melbourne experienced more rain this week than the entire monthly average for October.
The umpires conducted multiple inspections before deciding to abandon the match.
The cut-off time for a five-over game was 9.46 pm local time, but the match was called off before that.
